meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Tvaruzka Jesse Tow Joey Falco Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6348.

td.p: Michael Tvaruzka, a contract specialist from Eau Claire, Wisconsin
Jesse Tow, an after-school program coach from Austin, Texas
Joey Falco, a writer from Santa Monica, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,999)

tr.td: BOW TIES ARE COOL
ALL "INN"
HOUSTON, YOU HAVE A PROBLEM
BEGGARS CAN'T BE BOOZERS
KISSING
I GOT TO FIRST BASE

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Joey
Jesse
Michael

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Joey
Jesse
Michael
ROYAL WOMEN
MOVIE PROLOGUES
(Alex: I'll give you all or part of the movie prologue, you identify the film for me if you will.)
INTERNATIONAL PLURAL-ISM
"M"ISCELLANY
MAPMAKING
SPACE: THE FINAL CATEGORY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', 'This brightest star in Canis Major has more than twice the diameter of the Sun & gives off nearly 30 times as much light')
